Head: Boring pain behind right ear in mastoid process
Violent pulsation of arteries
Painful pressure above the root of nose
Abdomen: TENESMUS OF BLADDER AND RECTUM, with absence of stool and urine

name: Oniscus asellus
details: Has distinct diuretic properties; hence its use in dropsies. Asthmatic conditions, with bronchial catarrh.
